Blog.post: well i woke up kalled fabe and denton and just went sk8in at around 3 and we sk8ed on dentons street and then wnet 2 amandas then i predicted teh time from not even looking at teh clock and tehn me fabe n denton left and me n fabe walked liek 2 teh ymca where he wnet home and i wnet tehre got out and made movie plans to go c harold n kumar go 2 white caste so i wnet 2 my boys house and then we chilled there with his older bro jimmy and jims g/f danielle and then at liek 11 he gave me a ride home and heer i am now im talking to kaela n sum girl ive never met b4 so peese out
